Actions.Text: COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Creates the New York state entrepreneurial training act
Summary: Creates the New York state entrepreneurial training act to provide grants to eligible applicants to support and train entrepreneurial candidates.
LawSection: New York State Urban Development Corporation Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the New York state urban development corporation act, in relation to creating the "NYS entrepreneurial training act"
